verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments. Maschil of David; when the Ziphites came and said to Saul, Doth not David hide himself with us? Save<WH3467> me<WH430>, O God, by thy name<WH8034>, And judge<WH1777> me in thy might<WH1369>.
Hear <WH8085> my prayer<WH8605>, O God<WH430>; Give ear<WH238> to the words<WH561> of my mouth<WH6310>.
For strangers<WH2114> are risen up<WH6965> against me<WH6184>, And violent men have sought<WH1245> after my soul<WH5315>: They have not set<WH7760> God<WH430> before them<WH5542>. [[Selah
Behold <WH430>, God is my helper<WH5826>: The Lord<WH136> is of them that uphold<WH5564> my soul<WH5315>.
He will requite<WH7725> the evil<WH7451> unto mine enemies<WH8324>: Destroy<WH6789> thou them in thy truth<WH571>.
With a freewill-offering<WH5071> will I sacrifice<WH2076> unto thee<WH3034>: I will give thanks unto thy name<WH8034>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, for it is good<WH2896>.
For he hath delivered<WH5337> me out of all trouble<WH6869>; And mine eye<WH5869> hath seen<WH7200> my desire upon mine enemies<WH341>.
